sentence.Network_en: The cakes were burnt to a cinder.
But he took off his sweater and they began jogging slowly around the cinder track.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过,他还是脱了厚毛衣,两人开始沿煤渣跑道慢慢地晃着跑起来.

sentence.Network_en: You've burnt the toast to a cinder , ie so that it is hard and black.

list.abs: 火山渣锥-火山渣锥(Cinder cone)是指火山口周围由火成岩屑或火山渣等火山的喷出物质堆积而成的山丘。大多数的火山渣锥都很耐侵蚀,因为落到锥上的降雨渗入到高渗水.
进出口专业英语词汇(C4) ... Cindal 辛达尔变性铝合金 cinder brick 煤渣砖 cinder catcher 集尘器.
建筑专业英语词汇(C)|房地产建筑专业英语词汇 ... cinder aggregate 矿渣骨料 cinder block 煤渣砌块 cinder concrete 煤渣混凝土.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sinder 'slag', of Germanic origin; related to German Sinter. The similar but unconnected French cendre (from Latin cinis 'ashes') has influenced both the sense development and the spelling. Compare with sinter

means.word_mean: 1. a fragment of incombustible matter left after a wood or coal or charcoal fire

sentences.en: This material is variously termed ash, clinker, cinders or slag.
sentences.cn: 这种材料有不同的名称，如灰、炉渣、煤渣或矿渣。
